snippet: You can imagine what Rush Limbaugh, who came up with some choice words for a Georgetown Law School birth-control advocate, might have called Sanger, who, though technically married and the mother of three, had a number of ardent lovers, including a...
abstract: You can imagine what Rush Limbaugh, who came up with some choice words for a Georgetown Law School birth-control advocate, might have called Sanger, who, though technically married and the mother of three, had a number of ardent lovers, including a Spanish militant with whom she traipsed around Europe during months of self-imposed exile.

headline.main: What Would Rush Limbaugh Have Said to Margaret Sanger?
